other_title: デラックス エリアル 接触篇 ザ・ビギニング (Japanese)
plot: Those incompetent aliens are still plotting to conquer the Earth. The only obstacle in their path the giant, female robot ARIEL. When Kazumi recieves a mysterious love letter from a secret admirer, she then wonders if she should cancel her first date just so she can save Earth.
ending_theme: "Abunai Doyōbi" (危い土曜日; Perilous Saturday) by Michie Tomizawa, Yuko Mizutani, and Megumi Hayashibara (ep 1)
